welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zandhoven, Belgium! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly people. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is responsible for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport is used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport is used for transporting goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport is used for military operations and training exercises.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
